register.reg_condition: when FEAT_ETE is implemented, FEAT_TRC_SR is implemented and UInt(TRCIDR4.NUMCIDC) > n

field_description.para: Context identifier value. The width of this field is indicated by TRCIDR2.CIDSIZE. Unimplemented bits are RES0. After a PE Reset, the trace unit assumes that the Context identifier is zero until the PE updates the Context identifier.

access_permission_text.para: Must be programmed if any of the following are true:
Writes are CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE if the trace unit is not in the Idle state.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
